message: Bob, I'm offering you my product at a price of $1,450,000. This is a fair price considering its value to you. I believe this is a great deal for both of us. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counterpropose a price of $1,350,000 for your product. I believe this is a fair compromise given the value it holds for me. I look forward to your response.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. While I value our ongoing negotiation,  $1,350,000 is a bit low for me.  I'm willing to come down a little further to $1,400,000.  This is still a good deal for you, considering the value you place on the product. Let's see if we can reach an agreement at this price.

Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I understand your position and respect your valuation of the product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,375,000. I believe this price reflects a fair compromise between our respective valuations. I hope we can reach an agreement that satisfies both of us.
